title: Nintento Switch Pro Controller
description: The Nintendo Switch Pro Controller is a gamepad used for the Nintendo Switch console.

button.title: Gamepad button pressed events
button.description: This event is emitted when a button on the gamepad is pressed.

data.description: A string array containing all buttons that were pressed.

joystick.title: Gamepad joystick moved events
joystick.description: This event is emitted when the left joystick on the gamepad is moved.

data.description: An object containing the x and y coordinates and the angle of the joystick.
